to record on tape in advance

dt: {bc}official routine or procedure marked by excessive complexity which results in delay or inaction

dt.t: … enterprisers that show how people across the Nation are coping (or not coping) with such problems as unemployment, the budget deficit and Government {wi}red tape{/wi}.
… pompous officials (often lowly clerks) in love with {wi}red tape{/wi} who delight in obstructing the expedition of what should be simple procedures.
Initial plans became irretrievably mired in the {wi}red tape{/wi} of building permissions.
Their plan is simple enough and none too glamorous: create a Web site to help people {phrase}cut through red tape{/phrase}; i.e., pay for parking tickets and so on.

et: from the red tape formerly used to bind legal documents in England
shortdef: official routine or procedure marked by excessive complexity which results in delay or inaction
